helper

Class HashMapWeakValue<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.HashMapWeakValue<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - type of key to be stored
    V - type of weak referenced value to be stored

    public final class HashMapWeakValue<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    HashMap whose values are weak referenced. Thus, it differs from WeakHashMap where the keys are weak referenced.

    modified from http://stackoverflow.com/a/25634084

    Note: This is a very simplistic version of a map. Hence, it does not implement the Map interface.

    Author:
    Moritz Dorka
